EmailTemplate.name: Request for Checks
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings,
Thank you for reaching out to YETI Coolers. We have received your request for instructions on how to submit a check for payment on your account. I have attached a copy of that document to this email for easy access.
We look forward to working with you.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
